SEARCH
Package task

Class GradeBook

java.lang.Object
task.GradeBook
public class GradeBook extends Object
Represents an electronic student grade book with methods for managing and analyzing grades.

      public GradeBook(String studentName, int pageCount) throws GradeException
      Class constructor.
      Parameters:
      studentName - name in the format: first name, last name, patronymic.
      pageCount - count of pages in Grade Book.
      Throws:
      GradeException - special exception for GradeBook class. Contains information message.

    • writeInGradeBook

      public void writeInGradeBook(int currentSemester, String subject, int mark, boolean differentiated) throws GradeException
      Adds a new grade entry to the GradeBook for a specific semester.
      Parameters:
      currentSemester - number of page (semester) in GradeBook.
      subject - name of the subject.
      mark - grade for this subject.
      differentiated - boolean variable. True if mark is differentiated, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      GradeException - special exception for GradeBook class. Contains information message.

    • removeFromGradeBook

      public void removeFromGradeBook(int currentSemester, String subject)
      Removes a note from the gradebook for a specific semester.
      Parameters:
      currentSemester - number of page (semester) in GradeBook.
      subject - name of the subject to remove.

    • scholarship

      public boolean scholarship(int semester)
      Checks if the student is eligible for an increased scholarship in a specific semester.
      Parameters:
      semester - number of page (semester) in GradeBook.
      Returns:
      true if eligible, false otherwise.

    • redDiploma

      public boolean redDiploma()
      Checks if the student is eligible for a red diploma based on their entire academic history.
      Returns:
      true if eligible, false otherwise.
